document_data.name: the Ride
document_data.mainbody: '''The Ride''' was an open steppe land situated between the [[Dragonspine Mountains]], the [[Border Forest]] and the [[Thar|Gray Land of Thar]]. It was a land of cold plains.
document_data.History:
In the 14{{th}} Century [[DR]], the forces of [[Melvaunt]] and [[Zhentil Keep]] controlled lucrative mines that honeycombed the mountainsides north of the Ride.

In the 15{{th}} Century DR, the [[Warlock Knights of Vaasa]] began efforts to infiltrate the local tribes in hopes of claiming the region, and its mineral wealth, for themselves.
